title: Couple With Heart Person Man No Skin Tone Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a person and a man, with a heart symbol indicating love or affection. The medium-light skin tone is specified for the man.

Apple's meticulous design imbues them with a warm, inviting glow through realistic lighting and smooth gradients, emphasizing their connection.
